text:
AFAIK Microsoft does not ship updated ADMX templates with Edge itself, so if you
hope to *reliably* use local or group policy to manage Edge settings (i.e. a
'managed' environment) you need to deploy the ADMX templates and keep them up to
date yourself.
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdeployedge%2Fconfigure-microsoft-edge%23add-the-administrative-template-to-an-individual-computer&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C1ff19bb3d8e7473065e208dc27b3ed6d%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638428900937295241%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=QGWqaaTxiJ0IvLtwtHvVPM9AoYTSzDdB2vO73UYDJ3Y%3D&reserved=0
If you plan to simply push out registry settings then reference those from the
current policy documentation -
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdeployedge%2Fmicrosoft-edge-policies&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C1ff19bb3d8e7473065e208dc27b3ed6d%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638428900937302759%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=jEsBZ0761k9sAwGwlNNigQV8rDrFaAWlI%2BoYQv49r3I%3D&reserved=0
D.

metadata.topic: Is the registry key for controlling Edge MicrosoftEdge or just plain Edge?
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Is the registry key for controlling Edge MicrosoftEdge or just plain Edge?
metadata.email_text_original:
AFAIK Microsoft does not ship updated ADMX templates with Edge itself, so if you
hope to *reliably* use local or group policy to manage Edge settings (i.e. a
'managed' environment) you need to deploy the ADMX templates and keep them up to
date yourself.
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdeployedge%2Fconfigure-microsoft-edge%23add-the-administrative-template-to-an-individual-computer&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C1ff19bb3d8e7473065e208dc27b3ed6d%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638428900937295241%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=QGWqaaTxiJ0IvLtwtHvVPM9AoYTSzDdB2vO73UYDJ3Y%3D&reserved=0
If you plan to simply push out registry settings then reference those from the
current policy documentation -
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdeployedge%2Fmicrosoft-edge-policies&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C1ff19bb3d8e7473065e208dc27b3ed6d%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638428900937302759%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=jEsBZ0761k9sAwGwlNNigQV8rDrFaAWlI%2BoYQv49r3I%3D&reserved=0
D. -----Original Message----- From: 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement Sent:
Wednesday, February 7, 2024 4:30 AM To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Re: Is the registry key for controlling Edge
MicrosoftEdge or just plain Edge? I didn't install any policies on this machine.
I'm just doing this on a Windows 11 22H2 and seeing what happens in the
registry.
Link: None
